price: Neçə-neçə canlı var ki, ruzisini (əldə edə) daşıya bilmir. Onların da, sizin də ruzinizi Allah verir. O, Eşidəndir, Biləndir.
arabic: وَكَأَيِّن مِّن دَآبَّةٖ لَّا تَحۡمِلُ رِزۡقَهَا ٱللَّهُ يَرۡزُقُهَا وَإِيَّاكُمۡۚ وَهُوَ ٱلسَّمِيعُ ٱلۡعَلِيمُ

version.title: Azerbaijani translation - Ali Khan Mosaiv
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Azerbaijani by Khan Mosaiv. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: waka-ayyin min dābbatin lā taḥmilu riz'qahā al-lahu yarzuquhā wa-iyyākum wahuwa al-samīʿu al-ʿalīmu
